header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.text: Got a question? We've got answers. If you have some other questions, see our support center.

faqs.question: Is this a secure site for purchases?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We work with top payment companies which guarantees your safety and security. All billing information is stored on our payment processing partner which has the most stringent level of certification available in the payments industry.

faqs.question: How long are your contracts?
faqs.answer: Currently, we only offer monthly subscription. You can upgrade or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.

faqs.question: Can I update my card details?
faqs.answer: Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.

faqs.question: Can I try your service for free?
faqs.answer: Of course! Weâ€™re happy to offer a free plan to anyone who wants to try our service.
